title: iPad and book design
content:
Following up on Typophile [discussion about the iPad](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060353/http:/typophile.com/node/66725), there is some interesting commentary on book design and the potential of the iPad here:  
 [http://craigmod.com/journal/ipad\_and\_books/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060353/http:/craigmod.com/journal/ipad_and_books/ "http://craigmod.com/journal/ipad\_and\_books/")
author: eliason
